casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sulyaman Alisia WASALAAM. No. 435P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Sulyaman Alislam Wasalaam, Lumberton, for Wasalaam, Sulyaman Alisla. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of January 2016 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
